verses.text: If there \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, or a \w dreamer|strong="H2492"\w* of \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*, and \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* or a \w wonder|strong="H4159"\w*,

And the \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* or the \w wonder|strong="H4159"\w* come to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, whereof he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, which thou hast not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, and let us \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them;

Thou shalt not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of that \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, or that \w dreamer|strong="H2492"\w* of \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w proveth|strong="H5254"\w* you, to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* whether \w ye|strong="H3426"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with all your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and with all your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

Ye shall \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* him, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and ye shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him, and \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto him.

And that \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, or that \w dreamer|strong="H2492"\w* of \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*, shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*; because he hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* to \w turn|strong="H5627"\w* \add you\add* away from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which brought you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* you out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*, to \w thrust|strong="H5080"\w* thee out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee to walk \w in|strong="H3212"\w*. So shalt thou \w put|strong="H1197"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w away|strong="H1197"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee.  +  r 13.5  t to turn…: Heb. revolt against the \+nd LORD\+nd* *

¶ If thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, or thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, or thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, or the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of thy \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, or thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, which \add is\add* as thine own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w entice|strong="H5496"\w* thee \w secretly|strong="H5643"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, which thou hast not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, thou, nor thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*;

\add Namely\add*, of the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* you, \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* unto thee, or far \w off|strong="H7350"\w* from thee, from the \add one\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* even unto the \add other\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

Thou shalt not \w consent|strong="H0014"\w* unto him, nor \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto him; neither shall thine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w pity|strong="H2347"\w* him, neither shalt thou \w spare|strong="H2550"\w*, neither shalt thou \w conceal|strong="H3680"\w* him:

But thou shalt \w surely|strong="H2026"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* him; thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall be \w first|strong="H7223"\w* upon him to put him to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, and \w afterwards|strong="H0314"\w* the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And thou shalt \w stone|strong="H5619"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; because he hath \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to thrust thee \w away|strong="H5080"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which brought thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 13.10 \ft bondage: Heb. bondmen\f*

And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, and shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w any|strong="H1697"\w* such \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* as this is \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

¶ If thou shalt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add say\add* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* there, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\add Certain\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, are gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you, and have \w withdrawn|strong="H5080"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of their \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, which ye have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*;\f + \fr 13.13 \ft the children…: or, naughty men\f*

Then shalt thou \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w*, and make \w search|strong="H2713"\w*, and \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w diligently|strong="H3190"\w*; and, behold, \add if it be\add* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \add and\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w certain|strong="H3559"\w*, \add that\add* \w such|strong="H2063"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* is \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you;

Thou shalt \w surely|strong="H5221"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of that \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, destroying it \w utterly|strong="H2763"\w*, and all that \add is\add* therein, and the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* thereof, with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And thou shalt \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* all the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of it into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* thereof, and shalt \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and all the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* thereof every \w whit|strong="H3632"\w*, for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and it shall be an \w heap|strong="H8510"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; it shall not be built \w again|strong="H1129"\w*.

And there shall \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* \w nought|strong="H3972"\w* of the cursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w* to thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* may \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* of his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w shew|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w*, and have \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* upon thee, and \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* thee, as he hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*;\f + \fr 13.17 \ft cursed: or, devoted\f*

When thou shalt \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
